title: 'Mrs. America' Season Review
description:
'Mrs. America,' starring Cate Blanchett and Rose Byrne, is a master class on TV based on historic political events, and because of that, it sometimes hits too close to home.

Hosts: Alyssa Bereznak and Kate Halliwell
